price: The Hour is certainly coming; there is no doubt about it, and Allah will surely resurrect those who are in the graves.
arabic: وَأَنَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ ءَاتِيَةٞ لَّا رَيۡبَ فِيهَا وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَبۡعَثُ مَن فِي ٱلۡقُبُورِ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
